description: Current and avg. KPI-s. Expects 'get_load_average' and 'backends'  helpers to be installed on the monitored DB.

panels.description: PRIMARY - accepting writes, REPLICA - read-only

targets.query: select last("in_recovery_int") FROM "wal" WHERE "dbname" =~ /^$dbname$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time(365d) fill(none)

panels.title: Instance state

panels.description: Time from last Postgres process restart.  < 5m Error, < 30m Warn thresholds by default
panels.title: Instance uptime

panels.description:
"SHOW server_version_num;"
110005 => 11.5

targets.query: select last("server_version_num") FROM "settings" WHERE "dbname" =~ /^$dbname$/ AND $timeFilter fill(none)

panels.title: PG version num.

panels.description: Shared Buffers is the Postgres -managed file cache and 90%+ is what you normally want to see for best performance.

targets.query: SELECT ( non_negative_derivative(mean("blks_hit")) / (non_negative_derivative(mean("blks_hit")) + non_negative_derivative(mean("blks_read")))) * 100 FROM "db_stats" WHERE "dbname" =~ /^$dbname$/ AND  $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(none)

panels.title: Shared Buffers hit pct.

panels.description: Connected sessions, including Postgres internal processes like Autovacuum. < 1 Warn / > 300 Error thresholds by default
panels.title: Active sessions

panels.description: "max_connections" configuration setting. Changing requires re-start. 500/1000 Warn / Error thresholds by default
panels.title: Max. connections

panels.description: Max number of queries waiting on resources locked by other sessions.  1 Warn / 5 Err thresholds by default

targets.query: SELECT mean("count") FROM "locks_mode" WHERE ("dbname" =~ /^$dbname$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time(15m) fill(none)

panels.title: Blocked sessions

panels.description: Transactions opened but where no queries are being executed.

targets.query: SELECT last("idleintransaction") FROM "backends" WHERE ("dbname" =~ /^$dbname$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time(15m) fill(none)

panels.title: "Idle in TX" count

panels.description: 0.5% Warn / 1% Error thresholds by default

targets.query: SELECT (non_negative_derivative(mean("xact_rollback")) / (non_negative_derivative(mean("xact_commit")) + non_negative_derivative(mean("xact_rollback"))) * 100) FROM "db_stats" WHERE "dbname" =~ /^$dbname$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(none)

panels.title: TX error pct. (avg.)

panels.description: Transactions per Second. Last $online_interval average.  <0.1 % Error / < 1.0 Warn thresholds by default

targets.query: SELECT non_negative_derivative(last("xact_commit"), 1s) + non_negative_derivative(last("xact_rollback"), 1s) FROM "db_stats" WHERE "dbname" =~ /^$dbname$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(none)

panels.title: TPS (avg.)

panels.description: Queries per Second based on  \"pg_stat_statements\" extension info. Last $online_interval avg. < 0.1 Error / < 1 Warning thresholds by default"

targets.query: SELECT non_negative_derivative(last("calls"), 1s) FROM "stat_statements_calls" WHERE $timeFilter AND "dbname" =~ /^$dbname$/ GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(none)

panels.title: QPS (avg.)

panels.description: Last $online_interval avg. based on "pg_stat_statements" info. > 0.5s Warning / > 5s  Error thresholds by default

targets.query: select mean(q) from (SELECT non_negative_derivative(mean("total_time")) / non_negative_derivative(mean("calls")) as q FROM "stat_statements" WHERE "dbname" =~ /^$dbname$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY queryid, time($__interval) fill(none)) group by time($__interval) fill(none)

panels.title: Query runtime (avg.)

panels.description: Size for selected DB only

targets.query: SELECT time, last("size_b") FROM "db_size" WHERE "dbname" =~ /^$dbname$/ AND $timeFilter fill(none)

panels.title: DB size

targets.query: SELECT last("size_b")  - first("size_b") as diff FROM "db_size" WHERE "dbname" =~ /^$dbname$/  AND $timeFilter fill(none)

panels.description: Assumes get_psutil_disk wrapper being installed. 10/50GB Warn/Error thresholds by default

targets.query: SELECT last("free") FROM psutil_disk WHERE ("dbname" =~ /^$dbname$/) AND $timeFilter AND dir_or_tablespace = 'data_directory' GROUP BY time(365d) fill(none)

panels.title: DATADIR disk space left

panels.description: Longest query duration during last $online_interval
panels.title: Longest query runtime

panels.description: Server configuration changes. >1 Warn thresholds by default

targets.query: SELECT count("event") FROM "configuration_changes" WHERE ("dbname" =~ /^$dbname$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time(365d) fill(none)

panels.title: Config change events

panels.description: Number of DDL changes i.e. new or changed tables, columns, functions etc. >1 Warn thresholds by default

targets.query: SELECT count("event") FROM "table_changes" WHERE ("dbname" =~ /^$dbname$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time(365d) fill(none)

panels.title: Table changes

panels.description: Based on pg_stat_archiver. N/A when archiving is not enabled.
panels.title: WAL archiving status

panels.description: Transaction logs generation velocity.

targets.query: SELECT non_negative_derivative(last("xlog_location_b"), 1s) FROM "wal" WHERE ("dbname" =~ /^$dbname$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(none)

panels.title: WAL per second (avg.)

panels.description: Invalid indexes should be dropped as they're updated on DML operations but cannot be used for speeding up queries.

targets.query: select sum("last") from (select last("is_invalid_int") from index_stats where "dbname" =~ /^$dbname$/  AND $timeFilter  group by "index_full_name")

panels.title: Invalid indexes

panels.description: Postgres will use the smallest index in case 2 or more exists, so the others can be dropped. 'N/A' displayed both when no duplicate indexes or no metrics data for index_stats

targets.query: select count("count") from (select count("index_def") from (select last("index_def") as "index_def" from index_stats where "dbname" =~ /^$dbname$/  and $timeFilter  group by "table_full_name", "index_full_name", "index_def_hash") group by "table_full_name", "index_def_hash") where "count" > 1

panels.title: Duplicate indexes

panels.description: Checkpoints should normally be performed by the background "Checkpointer" process. If seeing high numbers then adjusting server configuration is recommended.

links.title: Opens "Checkpointer / Bgwriter / Block IO Stats :: Checkpoints" dashboard

panels.title: Checkpoints requested

panels.description: Estimated extra space held by tables (excluding indexes) that would disappear after "compacting".

targets.query: SELECT last("approx_table_bloat_b") as bloat FROM "table_bloat_approx_summary_sql" WHERE "dbname" =~ /^$dbname$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time(1d) fill(none)

panels.title: Approx. bloat

panels.description: On non-temporary  tables

targets.query: SELECT non_negative_derivative(last("tup_inserted"), 1m)  FROM "db_stats"  WHERE ("dbname" =~ /^$dbname$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(none)

panels.title: INSERT-s per minute (avg.)

panels.description: On non-temporary  tables

targets.query: SELECT non_negative_derivative(last("tup_updated"), 1m)  FROM "db_stats"  WHERE ("dbname" =~ /^$dbname$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(none)

panels.title: UPDATE-s per minute (avg.)

panels.description: On non-temporary  tables

targets.query: SELECT non_negative_derivative(last("tup_deleted"), 1m)  FROM "db_stats"  WHERE ("dbname" =~ /^$dbname$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(none)

panels.title: DELETE-s per minute (avg.)

panels.description: Frequent sequential scans on bigger tables should usually be avoided. Warn / Error thresholds: 10 / 100

targets.query: select sum("last") from (select last("scans") from (SELECT non_negative_derivative(last("seq_scan"), 1m) as "scans" FROM "table_stats" WHERE ("dbname" =~ /^$dbname$/) AND $timeFilter AND table_size_b > 100000000 GROUP BY time($__interval), table_full_name fill(none)) group by table_full_name)

panels.title: Seq. scans on >100 MB tables per minute (avg.)

panels.description: Assumes get_load_average helper being installed. 25 Warn / 50  Error  thresholds by default
panels.title: CPU load (avg.)

panels.description: Postgres writes temporary files to disk when sorting / grouping  big amounts of data that doesn't fit into "work_mem".  10/100 MB Warn / Error by default
panels.title: Temp. bytes per second (avg.)

panels.description: Long running AUTOVACUUM processes can hint at workload or configuration  problems

targets.query: SELECT max("longest_autovacuum_seconds") FROM "backends" WHERE ("dbname" =~ /^$dbname$/) AND $timeFilter fill(none)

panels.title: Longest AUTOVACUUM duration

panels.description: Based on db_stats.backup_duration_s  / pg_backup_start_time()  [9.3+] function. N/A if no backup in progress.

targets.query: SELECT last("backup_duration_s") FROM "db_stats" WHERE ("dbname" =~ /^$dbname$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time(3650d) fill(none)

panels.title: Backup duration

panels.description: Max. table age since last FREEZE. Could hint at problems when going into 100s of millions

targets.query: SELECT max("tx_freeze_age") FROM "table_stats" WHERE ("dbname" =~ /^$dbname$/) AND $timeFilter fill(none)

panels.title: Max. table FREEZE age

panels.description: In TX. Holds back VACUUM

targets.query: select max("xmin_age_tx") from  (SELECT last("xmin_age_tx") as "xmin_age_tx" FROM "replication_slots" WHERE ("dbname" =~ /^$dbname$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time(365d), slot_name fill(none))
SELECT last("max_xmin_age_tx") FROM "backends" WHERE ("dbname" =~ /^$dbname$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time(1d) fill(none)

panels.title: Max. XMIN horizon

panels.description: Inactive repl. slots accumulate WAL files until disk space runs out. Re-animate the replica or use  pg_drop_replication_slot() to remove the slot so that Postgres can delete the un-needed WALs.

targets.query: select sum(last) from (select last("non_active_int") FROM "replication_slots" WHERE "dbname" =~ /^$dbname$/  AND $timeFilter  group by "slot_name")

panels.title: Inactive repl. slots

panels.description: "Apply" (data made visible to queries on replica)  lag in bytes

targets.query: select max("apply_lag_b") FROM "replication" WHERE "dbname" =~ /^$dbname$/  AND $timeFilter

panels.title: Max. replication lag

panels.content: Brought to you by:

list.name: dbname
list.query: SHOW TAG VALUES FROM "wal", "db_stats" WITH KEY = "dbname" WHERE time > now() - 1h

title: Health-check
